item.description:
Hi All - Unos has what they call Snack Hours from 4-7 in their bar area. During Snack Hour you can get several appetizers for 2.99 to enjoy with your drinks. Here is the link for more info:

Unos Snack Hour Menu

Come and join me for a little after work unwind - Ill be at the Bar at 5pm and will stay until about 730. The Bar at the Unos on Boylston is to the right of the restaurant in a separate little area.

Encourage you to pay as you order or maintain your own tab
item.how_to_find_us: Ill be at the bar with a pink fleece scarf on!
item.name: Let's Get Happy at Unos
